title: Stolen Beauty
description: OverviewAn enquiry, kidnapping plot, brother returned from the dead, family secret & forbidden love. This is what faces Grace & Alex when they return to the Forum after being in hiding from thier enemies & friends alike. As they struggle with their adversities, Grace begins to realise that her brother may not be the saviour she prayed for. As the final battle looms, will Grace make the ultimate sacrifice?
author: Jessica Cartwright
